name: Welcome on the portfolio site of Boyoung Kim
body:
### Boyoung Kim (김보영)
(Maetan dong) 129, Samsung-ro, Yeongtong-gu, Suwon-si, Gyeonggi-do 16677, Korea  
Skype id: bbo.kim  
E-mail: by1110.kim[at]samsung.com | bykim@nae-lab.org

### Brief Bio
Boyoung, born in Korea, studied [Electric Engineering](http://ee.ewha.ac.kr/) ( BSc and MSc ) at [Ewha Woman’s university](http://ewha.ac.kr). In 2011 she is selected as MEXT (Monbukagakusyo) scholarship research student and soon started research in [Naemura Laboratory](http://www.nae-lab.org/) at [the University of Tokyo](http://www.u-tokyo.ac.jp/), Japan. Early 2015 she returned to Korea to join the Robot Technology Team in Samsung Electronics where she has been researched. Early 2016 Boyoung defended her PhD research on “Blind Deconvolution on 3D Fluorescence Microscopy using Depth-variant Asymmetric PSF” at the University of Tokyo.

### Major Interests
Image Processing (especially biomedical image, image restoration and deblurring), Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Optimization 

### Journal Publications
1. Kim, J., An, S., Ahn, S., & ++Kim, B.++ (2013). Depth-variant deconvolution of 3D widefield fluorescence microscopy using the penalized maximum likelihood estimation method. Optics express, 21(23), 27668-27681.
2. ++Kim, B.,++ & Naemura, T. (2015). Blind depth-variant deconvolution of 3D data in wide-field fluorescence microscopy. Scientific reports, 5.  
3. ++Kim, B.,++ & Naemura, T. (2016). Blind deconvolution of 3D fluorescence microscopy using depth‐variant asymmetric PSF. Microscopy research and technique, 79(6), 480-494.

### Conference Publications
1. ++Boyoung Kim++, Daeun Kim, Jeong-Tae Kim, “PSF modeling and image deconvolution for 3D fluorescence microscopy images”, Korea signal processing conference, Vol 22, No.1, pp81-84, 2009.  
2. ++Boyoung Kim++, Jeong-Tae Kim, “An experimental study on the estimation of depth variant point spread function for fluorescence microscopy”, Korea signal processing conference, Vol 23, 2010.  
3. Seungmi Oh, Junhee Park, ++Boyoung Kim++, Jeongtae Kim, Byunguk Lee, “현미경영상의 Depth 정보복원방법”, IPIU(Workshop on Image Processing and Image Understanding), 2010.  
4. ++Boyoung Kim++ and Takeshi Naemura: “Robust blind deconvolution for fluorescence microscopy using GEM algorithm,” Proc. SPIE vol. 8669, Medical Imaging, Image Processing, paper 8669-94 (2013.2).
5. Nagao Syun, ++Boyoung Kim++, Hanyuool Kim, Mikyoung Seo, Takahiro Tsujii,“SIGGRAPH ASIA2012 report,” The Institute of Image Information and Television Engineers 2013年 3 月号<話題(見聞記)>欄 , (2013.3)

### Projects
1. Korea Institute for Advancement of Technology, Advanced Graduate Education Program on Reality Platform Implementation (2009.2-2010.8)  
2. Korea Research Foundation, Research of core technology for the next generation information communication system: BK21 (2009.2-2011.2)  
3. Korea Science and Engineering Foundation, High resolution spatiotemporal cellular bioimage computing technology (2009.2-2011.2)  
4. Korea Research Foundation, Development of two dimensional barcode image restoration algorithm for mobile devices (2009.2-2010.6)  

###Honors and Awards
2011 Campus patent strategy universiade, Samsung Electronics CEO prize in the field of technology to be Applicable to the 3D mobile  
2011.04-2015.03 Japan Monbukagakusho Scholarship  
  
  
Last updated on September 4, 2016  
2016 Boyoung Kim. All right reserve. 저작자표시 | 비영리 | 변경금지
